definition[0]: to feel sympathy with someone or be able to share their feelings
example[0]: Humans can easily identify with the emotional expressions of chimpanzees.
definition[1]: to think that someone is very closely related to or involved with something such as a political group
example[2]: She has always been identified with the radical left.
definition[2]: to think that something is the same as, or closely related to, something else
example[3]: the attempt to identify crime with poverty and social problems
